data.author: Dieter Fiebelkorn

changelog.release_notes: - Long press on Hue-Value change the color by 60 degrees
- Implementing Long pressed Up/Down on Brightness, Hue and Saturation

- Long select on the middle button switch on/off the selected light directly
- Show information, if no lights / groups / scenes found on bridge's config

You can configure 'scenes' to hide them from 'scenes section'
(will saved, to update the scenes list shake the watch)

From Philips API documentation:
4.5. Delete scene - Scenes cannot be deleted from the bridge. When the maximum number of scenes (200) has been reached the scene which has been used the least is recycled.

Optimizing: Sending only the value which are changed
Groups: Handling brightness/saturation without changing color

Controlling your Philips Hue Bridge in best way
- Highly usable
- Many configuration
- Section organized
- Switch sections off
- Put sections to submenus
- Controlling Brightness, Colormap, Hue, Saturation

data.description:
Controlling your Philips Hue Bridge in best way
- Highly usable 
- Many configuration 
- Section organized 
- Switch sections off 
- Put sections to submenus 
- Controlling Brightness, Colormap, Hue, Saturation
V 1.1
- Optimizing: Sending only the value which are changed
- Groups: Handling brightness/saturation without changing color 
V 1.2
- Hide unreachable lights (configurable)
V 1.3
- You can configure 'scenes' to hide them from 'scenes section'
  (will saved, to update the scenes list shake the watch)
V 1.4
- Long pressing on the middle button switch on/off the selected light directly
- Show information, if no lights / groups / scenes found on bridge's config
V 1.5
- Implementing Long pressed Up/Down on Brightness, Hue and Saturation
V 1.6
- Long press on Hue-Value change the color by 60 degrees 
V 1.7
- Add "Reset" connection
data.title: Pe bb le Hue
